item.title: Are Avenue Supermarts Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Avenue Supermarts Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are strong, with record net sales of ₹18,100.88 crores and a net profit of ₹855.92 crores, reflecting significant year-on-year growth. However, the company faces challenges with operating margins and capital efficiency amid competitive pressures. Time: Jan 11 2026 07:11 PM IST

item.title: Are Integra Essentia Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Integra Essentia Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show strong sales growth of 12.37% year-on-year, but profitability remains a concern with low operating margins and reliance on non-operating income, raising questions about long-term sustainability. Overall, the financial health indicates significant challenges despite the sales increase. Time: Jan 11 2026 07:11 PM IST

item.title: Are Gretex Corporate Services Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Gretex Corporate Services Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are concerning, showing a significant decline in net profit to ₹1.61 crores and negative operating margins, indicating operational challenges and a downward trend in financial performance. The company needs to reassess its strategy to address these issues. Time: Jan 11 2026 07:10 PM IST
